portfolio.title: Travel-World
portfolio.description: Travel-World is a comprehensive platform that allows users to browse, book, and manage travel packages. It offers a user-friendly interface for both travelers and administrators. Built with HTML, CSS, React, Express.js, and MongoDB.

portfolio.title: YosifFit
portfolio.description: YosifFit is a fully responsive personal trainer website, tailored to showcase your services and client successes across all devices. Built with HTML, CSS, and React, it provides an engaging and user-friendly platform for displaying membership plans, training programs, and client testimonials.

portfolio.title: Monopol 08
portfolio.description: Monopol is a fully responsive real estate website, optimized for all devices. Built with HTML, CSS, and Angular, it offers a seamless and user-friendly experience for property browsing and management. Enjoy consistent performance and an attractive interface on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

portfolio.title: Tech Storm
portfolio.description: Tech Storm is a sleek, responsive website designed for buying laptops. Developed using HTML, CSS, and React, it ensures a smooth and engaging shopping experience on any device. Whether you're on a desktop, tablet, or smartphone, Tech Storm provides consistent performance and an intuitive interface for all your tech needs.
